they are fine and I make them laugh

darija: makanch ymken nb9a bo7di f ddar o n9abl rassi

darija: lmakla men jiha khra machi chi 7aja.

darija: dik simana mchina l l9el3a dial Windsor

darija: o merra fch7al kayji chi wa7d ydir lina chi spectacle.

darija: ana bikhir o kantmenna nkon chad f rassi b7alk fach tkon 3ndi 85 3am!

eng: There was a poor girl there called Anya who we wouldn't leave alone

darija: bent sghira kheddama f dar l3ajaza?

darija: msikina, douwz 7yatha wsT chchorraf, m7roumin o cherraf.

darija: 3reft, walakin chkon moul lfalTa f hadchi?

darija: khaSni n9lbo 3la had Anya, o nwerrih annaha baghia ghi flousso

eng: The mini-skirt and the summer shoes, in April and in a long time, it's a risk.

darija: beSSa7, walakin rah mori7in, o fach khrejt men ddar kant chemch!

darija: mab9itch chab kif kent ch7al hada

I think she might be a bit too young for you

darija: rah kenti dima 7aDra, f 5 dial tjwijat diali lli maSd9ouch

darija: kenti dima 7adra bach t9aDDi l omor

darija: dima kant katjini lfikra dial ncherfo bjouj romansia

darija: ghadi nsekhen rassi bl foular dialk!

darija: charika diali kayna f jouj blayS.
hanta ghadi tchouf, lmenDer zwin fach ghadi nTl3o.

darija: kankhaf nchouf men cherjem diali f TTb9a tania f ddar!

darija: ma3mrni 3jbni l3lou, o ghadi nTl3o lfo9 bezzaf!

darija: s7ab, men lfo9, b7al chi b7er dial l9Ten.

darija: o n9der nsa hadchi li yallah guelti 3la l carte bancaire diali.
